0: Texas state Senator Wendy Davis spent 13 hours on her feet at the Texas Capitol during a filibuster of an abortion bill that would have greatly restricted abortions in the state. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "It was an amazing moment for democracy in Texas," Senator Davis said on AC360. The large number of growing supporters inside the capitol gave her a push of energy. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR She told Anderson, "I underestimated how difficult it would be both physically and mentally.
